page.title: 20350 YEARS OF THE POST OFFICE
page.content:
On the 30th July 350 years ago, {King {Charles 1st}signed a proclamation which started the {Post Office.}This took place in the grounds of{Bagshot {Park}at a hunting lodge which no longer exists.
On 29th July,1985,{PRINCE CHARLES}is coming to Bagshot Park and the{Woking {Post Office}is organising a special event to mark the anniversary.
There will be a cavalcade of{postal {uniforms and vehicles}used through the years.A stained glass window will form the centre piece of the display.
Local people and school children will be allowed into the Park for this special occasion.
